alfredsnippet.snippet:
Journal of Scientific Exploration, Vol. 14, No. 3, 2000, p.450

"Theory is only an attempt to simplify the connection between currently known facts. The prime responsibility of science is to keep in mind that there is never certainty and the most important obligation is to keep testing the fundamental assumptions."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Prime Responsibility of Science is to Keep In Mind that There is Never Certainty
